message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset.

Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $1000000 is unfortunately above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $850000 for it. This is my best offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for 950000. This is my best counteroffer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $950000 is still too high for me. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $850000. This is my best offer and I'm not able to go higher.

I understand that 950000 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for 900000. This is my final counteroffer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
